description: Helps craft effective prompts for AI based on a defined methodology.

task_goal.description: Clearly articulate what you want the AI (that will use the generated prompt) to achieve.

desired_output_format.description: Specify the desired output format from the AI (e.g., list, table, JSON, paragraph, code block).

accuracy_warnings.description: Any specific warnings or guidance to give the AI regarding accuracy for the task.

context_for_ai.description: Relevant background information to help the AI understand the task.

specific_details.description: Other specific and detailed instructions or constraints for the AI.

examples_input_output.description: Examples of desired input-output pairs to guide the AI's behavior. E.g., INPUT: ..., OUTPUT: ... (use newlines for multiple examples).
